longInfo:
Passport required.
- Passports and/or passport replacing documents must be valid
  on arrival.
Passport Exemptions:
- Holders of a National ID Card issued to nationals of
  Curacao. 

Visa required, except for A max. stay of 90 days:
 - for nationals of Curacao; 
Minors:
- Minors under 14 years of age  
Additional Information:
- The max. stay is granted within 6 months to visa exempt
  nationals. 
Warning:
- Visitors not holding return/onward tickets could be refused
  entry
